Package fr.umlv.chathack.resources.frames

Interface ClientVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientContext
public interface ClientVisitor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void abortPrivateCommunicationRequest​(String login)
    Abort the private communication request with the given client.
    void askForPrivateCommunication​(String login)
    Ask the client if he wishes to establish a private communication with the given client.
    void connectToPrivateServer​(InetSocketAddress server, String login, int tokenID)
    Connect the client to the server corresponding to another client's private server.
    void downloadFile​(int fileID, byte[] data)
    Download a file, chunk by chunk.
    void initFileDownload​(String fileName, int fileSize, int fileID)
    Initiates a file download, to which a unique identifier is assigned.
    void log​(Level level, String msg)
    Log a message.
    void printPrivateMessage​(String message)
    Print a private message, if the client is authenticated.
    void tryAuthenticate​(int id, String login)
    Try to authenticate the given client with the given token ID.

  • Method Details

    • log

      void log​(Level level, String msg)
      Log a message.
      Parameters:
      level - One of the message level identifiers, e.g., SEVERE.
      msg - The string message (or a key in the message catalog).

    • abortPrivateCommunicationRequest

      void abortPrivateCommunicationRequest​(String login)
      Abort the private communication request with the given client.
      Parameters:
      login - The client's login.

    • connectToPrivateServer

      void connectToPrivateServer​(InetSocketAddress server, String login, int tokenID) throws IOException
      Connect the client to the server corresponding to another client's private server.
      Parameters:
      server - The server to connect to.
      login - The login of the server owner.
      tokenID - The id assigned to the communication with the server.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • tryAuthenticate

      void tryAuthenticate​(int id, String login)
      Try to authenticate the given client with the given token ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The token ID.
      login - The login.

    • printPrivateMessage

      void printPrivateMessage​(String message)
      Print a private message, if the client is authenticated.
      Parameters:
      message - The message

    • askForPrivateCommunication

      void askForPrivateCommunication​(String login)
      Ask the client if he wishes to establish a private communication with the given client.
      Parameters:
      login - The client's login.

    • initFileDownload

      void initFileDownload​(String fileName, int fileSize, int fileID)
      Initiates a file download, to which a unique identifier is assigned.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The file name.
      fileSize - The full size of the file.
      fileID - The file identifier.

    • downloadFile

      void downloadFile​(int fileID, byte[] data)
      Download a file, chunk by chunk.
      Parameters:
      fileID - The file identifier.
      data - The 'chunk data' of the file.
